threads: The clean energy revolution is here and we’re going to power it with green union jobs.
text: @liberal 😴 y'all still on that green energy BS? 💩 it's a scam, we don't need no unions or jobs for that. 💔 just give me my fossil fuels and let me keep my freedom. 🤠
